extendedInfo.description: READ IT FIRST!!!ONLY FOR MDPI DEVICES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Only screens MDPI (320x480) with CyanogenMod7 firmware.Please stop writing negative reviews of this theme, if you put a theme on the device and HDPI you have it not work, it's not fair!*** Probably everyone knows how to penetrate new smartphone Samsung Galaxy S3 with firmware Touchwiz 5, so I want to introduce you my new theme, done in the style of Touchwiz5))) In this theme are also special wallpaper and icons. Your evaluation is very important to me, pleasant to use;)

reviews.title: Sweeeeeet so Beautiful!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: I just in love with this theme thanks dev. Please can u make the signal bar & data sign green add some more icons & change the clock thanks anyways
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice theme
reviews.comment: The theme looks really good but the status bar icons and dailer doesn\'t look like touchwiz5.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keyaboard???
reviews.comment: Mr dev... :-D..when will you be able to theme the keyboard..honestly this is a very impressive theme.but we are geting frustrated whrn the keyboard opens.please if you can theme it.it would be great.thnk u for this theme.and another thing for LDPI also this theme looks very shiny.great.update please,with the keyboard.
reviews.author: Eranga Jayawardane

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Works great on my Samsung Transform. For people having issues with the status bar not changing, just reboot the phone and it will change to the right one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I loved it :)  Only one problem.. while charging its not showing any sign that its charging! Other wise its good ;)
reviews.author: Sudip Mahali

reviews.title: Weird
reviews.comment: Works, but giant H keeps flickering when using data
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but too bad
reviews.comment: It\'s a good theme. I just wish the status bar isn\'t transparent. Maybe 2 versions should\'ve been uploaded, but nice..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wildfire buzz
reviews.comment: Oh Man great theme really i love this!!! Fits great on my wildfire cm7. Thanx!
reviews.author: Marco Heath

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Not bad
reviews.author: madhurjya borah

reviews.title: Cool stuff..
reviews.comment: Me gusta
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Improperly compiled
reviews.comment: Whenever I try to apply this theme, it says that it is improperly compiled. Please fix in a newer version, and I will use it.  But for now, Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Suvan Leelasena

reviews.title: Theme compiled incorectly
reviews.comment: I get this error. MotoDroid running steel Droid cm7.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well
reviews.comment: I love it,  but when I get an email or message, I pull down the notifications to see what it it, but since the notification background is black and transparent its hard to read it. Other than that, this is my favorite theme.
reviews.author: Brandon Garcia

reviews.title: awesome.
reviews.comment: *****. post on xda for more publicity. theme music app and rest if you can,please.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: help me.
reviews.comment: i installed cm7(s3) on my galaxy ace. it works. the default launcher is touchwiz 5(holo launcher). when i wnt to update the launcher, it prompt me to uninstall the launcher and install the new version. bt when i installed the new version of holo launcher, i cnt apply ths theme. cn you pls tell me whts the prob? thankyou.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \"Improperly Compiled\"
reviews.comment: It says the theme was improperly compiled together, and won\'t work for the Motorola Triumph. I\'d love to have it to work, but it\'s a great theme anyways.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Theme!
reviews.comment: looks awasome on my old Galaxy 3..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NicE attempT
reviews.comment: Pls make theme 4 hdpi..../// I\'m waiting

reviews.title: Will rate with 5 stars when the transparent notification bar is gone
reviews.comment: Everything has been great so far

reviews.title: HTC wildfire
reviews.comment: Dial pad does not fit. Or else great.
